mapper.select: SELECT id , vd_id as "vdId" , part , is_end as "isEnd" , source_vd_id as "sourceVdId" , create_at as "createAt" , create_by as "createBy" , schedule_enable as "scheduleEnable" , status , schedule_yn as "scheduleYN" FROM vd_source where status != #{status} order by part DESC;
select coalesce(MAX(part), 0) FROM vd_source WHERE vd_id = #{vdId}
